duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact with customers, listen to their questions and concerns and provide timely responses.
Educate clients about the company’s products, services, and offers.
Schedule appointments, take orders, monitor service progress, calculate charges, and process payments.
Review customer accounts and report changes to internal staff.
Ability to manage complaints, returns and resolve customer grievances.
Serve as a resource and support between customers, technicians, and management.
